content.title: Build a Firewall Against Extreme Poverty
content.lead: Partner with Social Income and demonstrate social responsibility through meaningful, lasting impact in the fight against extreme poverty.
content.reason-description-1: Your donation directly funds innovative, and empowering direct-cash programs for people in extreme poverty. Direct cash transfers are evidence-based, effective poverty relief for the most vulnerable.
content.reason-description-2: Clearly demonstrate to your employees, partners, and clients your genuine commitment to social impact, directly supporting systemic change against poverty and global inequality.
content.reason-description-3: Start with a simple donation or seamlessly transition into launching your organization's own direct cash program, customized to your mission, values, and the cause you care about.
content.reason-description-4: Social Income is a fully volunteer-driven open source initiative, which keeps our administrative costs exceptionally low. This means donations become monthly payments sent straight to recipients’ phones.
content.section-title-3: Ways Your Organization Can Make a Difference
content.section-3-option-2b: Donate your employees’ time to develop Social Income further.
content.section-3-option-3b: “Adopt a Community” by sponsoring your own tailored cash-transfer program.
